Our mission is to enable partners to build deep expertise and thriving business practices with Pivotal.
Secure, Modern Infrastructure
In August, our main editorial focus was on Secure, Modern Infrastructure. Often we focus on the user-facing applications, but building a solid, secure infrastructure layer is critical to success.
We’ve organized a few of our most popular pieces of content about secure, modern infrastructure below. However, if you’d like to see all of the content we publish on the topic, the best place to look is in our Content stream <[[https://content.pivotal.io/secure-modern-infrastructure]]> -- and don’t forget that this stream is embeddable <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/sales/partner-information.aspx#contentstream]]> if you’d like always-fresh content for your site!
Blogs
- It’s a Multi-cloud World. Here’s How to Consume It Successfully <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/it-s-a-multi-cloud-world-here-s-how-to-consume-it-successfully]]>. In this article, Senior Director Richard Seroter discusses how he thinks about building services across multiple clouds in a modern infrastructure. - Are you familiar with the DISA STIGs? Want to hear about how the OS that Cloud Foundry is built on is now certified by the Defense Information Systems Agency? We’ve got the article for you <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/disa-new-stigs-include-ubuntu-an-embedded-operating-system-because-the-best-os-is-the-one-you-don-t-have-to-worry-about]]>!
Videos, Podcasts & Webinars
- Data science and Machine Learning are some of the biggest buzzwords in the industry these days. Listen here on how to Take Application Security to the Next Level with Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/take-application-security-to-the-next-level-with-data-science-ep-77]]>.

Featured Tuesday - Thursday Sessions:

Greenplum Partner Spotlight

Check out the Data Page <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/delivery/working-with-data.aspx#DataProductUpdates]]> for the latest Greenplum release details, demonstration ideas, and information from a few of our data partners.

BEST PRACTICE OF THE MONTH: Making the Most of SpringOne Platform 2018
As we covered in our Partner-exclusive webinar last month (replay and slides are here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/more/recordings.aspx]]>), here are some top tips for making the most of your time at SpringOne. Remember, it’s more than just a place to watch and learn!
- Invite your clients and prospects! By bringing along your own clients, you’re helping to ensure that they get the most out of the conference. - Spend time with your customers. Don’t just get them to the conference, but spend time with them. Learn about what is most interesting to them, and take advantage of all the excitement! - Get to know the Pivotal account teams. Partnering with Pivotal account teams on a specific target account is the best way to go in with a joint message. Developing those relationships while you’re in-person at S1P is an excellent opportunity.
PARTNER SPOTLIGHT
PARTNER TYPE: Independent Software Vendor PRODUCT FOCUS: Pivotal Cloud Foundry
Purpose built for today’s enterprises, Dynatrace is the only AI-powered, full stack and completely automated monitoring solution that provides deep insight (answers, not data) into every user, every transaction, across every application. That’s why the world’s leading brands, including 72 of the Fortune 100, trust Dynatrace to optimize customer experiences, innovate faster, and modernize IT operations with absolute confidence.
Getting the Joint Story Out: Dynatrace showcases its experience and thought leadership around PCF and cloud-native concepts with a steady drumbeat of content. Here are a few highlights:
- Takeaways from the fireside chat <[[https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/pivotal-ceo-rob-mees-perform-2018-recap/]]> between Rob Mee, CEO of Pivotal Software, and Andrew Hittle, Chief Customer Officer at Dynatrace, at Dynatrace Perform 2018. - Dynatrace.com's page for Pivotal <[[https://www.dynatrace.com/partners/technology-partners/pivotal/]]>, which features a video with Nima Badiey, Pivotal’s Head of Ecosystem Technology, talking about the partnership. - Get hands on with Dynatrace and PCF at this SpringOne Platform workshop <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/dynatrace]]>.
Find more content from Dynatrace about working with Pivotal here: Content.Pivotal.Io/Dynatrace <[[https://content.pivotal.io/dynatrace]]>
Joint Case Study: Humana Read this recent post <[[https://assets.dynatrace.com/en/docs/fs/2857-humana-case-study-blog-reprint-dynatrace.pdf]]> about how Dynatrace’s integration with PCF supports Humana’s goal of “ubiquitous monitoring”. As told by Humana’s Director IT, Bob Johnson, at Perform 2018 earlier this year, monitoring is critical to the healthcare company’s commitment to delivering industry-leading digital experiences to customers.
“Dynatrace is proud to be a Pivotal Premier Technology Partner, sharing the common goal of helping enterprise organizations build and run their applications at speed and scale. Pivotal with PCF making it easy to deploy highly distributed and complex applications at scale, and Dynatrace monitoring the full PCF environment utilizing automation and artificial intelligence.”
- Michael Allen, VP Partners, Dynatrace
